interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sam&Helen Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit, 5Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes And 2 Tubes Magnetic Eyeliners With Eyelash Applicator-No Glue Needed
Review Date: 2020/06/23
Store: Sam&Helen
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sam&Helen', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:f429642b52f8b0f5ebb4606cb77edc77]] I love these magnetic eyelashes. It’s so much easier than applying glue, in my opinion. I did two thin layers of magnetic eyeliner and allowed to dry. It did stick to my upper lid when I moved my eyelids up as I waited for them to dry. Once dry, I used the tweezer to apply the magnet eyelash. Each eyelash has tiny magnetics that adhere to the liner. I was pleasantly surprised that it worked!! The tweezers was not helpful to me for applying, and the second lash I applied with my hands without a problem. Beautiful lashes!! Wore them all day yesterday and wasn’t uncomfortable at all. Didn’t come off in the wind going to dinner. I simply removed with my hands to replace on the storage palette and removed liner with coconut oil. Lashes are glamorous and reusable. LOVE THEM!!!
Review Title: Works great for all day wear!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
YRMJK
{'Brand': 'YRMJK', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Soft', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 3.1 x 2.7 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '738426030676', 'Manufacturer': 'MUTTUS'}
[[VIDEOID:b2565b535e1d3f3297ca6703d7f26383]] A tip for those would never used an electric toothbrush: put the toothbrush into your mouth and then turn on (and off before removing from mouth). Lol, I got toothpaste everywhere and learned this the hard way. Functionally, the vibrations are powerful by default, so if you are sensitive like me, turn it down. I’ve used it 4 times now and the first time it was strange, but now I am use to it. There are 5 different pulsating settings (see video). The plus and minus icons allow for easy and quick adjustment of how hard/soft - fast/slow the vibrating brush-head will pulsate. The bristles on the brush attachment is firm, but soft on gums; so there is some bend to the bristles and was comfortable for me. It sits on a charger to power it up via usb cord that plugs into standard charger plug. The case is beyond awesome. I travel for conferences and this stores the brush and charger with the brush head in a beautiful pink bottom and clear top hard case. Easy to pack and go. My teeth feels very clean after using this electronic toothbrush. For my set, I have 5 extra brush head attachments for exchanging after wearing out. This set looks exactly like advertised. I love the pink design. It is long and slender with sliver trim. My video will show the different settings and I hope you can hear the slight vibration changes because you could easily tell from the sound of the pulse by which setting it is on through a couple of uses. My favorite thing about it is that the charger is small and doesn’t take up any room on the sink countertop. The travel case is sturdy. The quality of this brush is so great that I don’t want to ever go back to a standard manual toothbrush. I highly recommend if you need a travel brush that is electronic! Update: A week later and I still love it! Everything works very well!!
Great travel toothbrush!
Persephone Ombre Blonde Lace Front Wig Wavy Soft Brown Roots Ash Blonde Ombre Wigs for Women Glueless Long Wavy Synthetic Wig with Middle Parting Heat Resistant 22 Inches
Persephone
{'Color': 'Brown Roots Ash Blonde Ombre', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 6.2 x 2.3 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '708210345712'}
[[VIDEOID:e6486dec3002b28b72d65864eaf95d53]] Y’all!!! I can’t give this wig enough stars! For the price, this is an outstanding wig - Persephone Ombré Blonde! Now, I cut the pace all the way back and place it about 1-2” behind my hairline, so I’ve pulled out my front hair to blend with the wig. It does have wig combs to keep it secure and, although it comes with an awesome wig cap, I do NOT wear a cap. Stays on securely all day. Great wig cap construction with adjustable straps to help custom to head. Didn’t tangle. Soft! Huge fan!! This is an outstanding wig and the price is a great value!!! L O V E !!
LOVE!
Miss U Hair Long Wavy Dyeing Color Wig Burgundy Ombre Blonde Cosplay Costume Wig
M MISS U HAIR
{'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'M MISS U HAIR', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 8 x 1.7 inches; 11.36 Ounces'}
[[VIDEOID:70e9f5c0d3612527c251dde5937efab3]] This Miss U Hair is just pass shoulder length with good curl. This is a good quality character, cosplay, or Halloween wig. Cap construction is good and comfy, but no combs to secure in place, so it did slide around on my head. It came with a wig cap. The part is fluffy and thick, as is the hair line, so I was unable to get a natural look from forehead to hairline, but for the function of Cosplay character, this is on the higher quality.
Nice for Cosplay purposes.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor electronic dental care products designed for travel and convenience, while increasingly expanding their interest to fashionable hair and beauty accessories, including wigs for cosplay and magnetic eyelashes for ease of application.
- **Usage Experience:** They appreciate functionality, as evidenced by sharing tips for first-time users in both dental care and beauty products. The user effectively navigates product features that enhance usability and comfort, highlighting a strong preference for effortless application processes.
- **Design & Features:** Drawn to aesthetic elements such as sleek designs and pink hues, they seek products that enhance personal appearance while maintaining comfort. This includes stylish makeup options that align with their preference for practicality.
- **Sensitivity Consideration:** Values comfort, favoring adjustable settings for sensitivity in dental products and ensuring all accessories, especially lashes, fit securely without discomfort, enhancing overall wearability.
- **Maintenance & Quality:** Prioritizes high-quality, durable brands that are easy to maintain across both dental and beauty products, reflecting a commitment to longevity and ease of use.
- **Positive Engagement:** Maintains a positive attitude towards product performance, exemplifying satisfaction and brand loyalty in both beauty and hair product assessments.
- **Recommendation Behavior:** Demonstrates a willingness to recommend products, showcasing trust in their quality and functionality across dental care and beauty purchases.

The user enjoys effective, aesthetically pleasing, and travel-friendly solutions for personal care and beauty, actively engaging with items suited for cosplay and daily wear.
